attributes.action: Our black rubbish bins to be collected every 2 weeks again NOT 3
attributes.background:
Council say they save money by having our black bins collected every 3 weeks! Bullcrap! 
So much litter around these days! 
Its a mess!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Your bin collection is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
